title: Ongoing issue
body: Right guys. so I have an ongoing problem with npc hit boxes showing up as shown in the photo, anyone who provides me with a solution before riot does will receive a gift and my unconditional love.

replies.body:
I reckon your some of your files are corrupted. 
Try to repair your files.
Click the question mark button on the launcher and click repair.
If not maybe try lowering and changing around your graphics settings once in game.

Are you sure you want to fix that? I think it's beautiful. :P

But anyway, how long has it been since you last updated your graphics drivers?
